## getRootRelativeUrl() function

Given a fully-qualified URL, returns a root-relative URL.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getRootRelativeUrl: (fullyQualifiedUrl: string) => string
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

fullyQualifiedUrl


</td><td>

string


</td><td>


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

string

## Example


```ts
getRootRelativeUrl("https://asl19.org/")
// "/"
getRootRelativeUrl("https://asl19.org/foo")
// "/foo"
```
